channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. exceptionalism is now driving markets — if only this jinx can be avoided
item.description: Markets increasingly as pricing in a scenario of U.S. exceptionalism.

item.title: Threat of Chinese Overcapacity Looms Over Memory Chips
item.description: Vital technology component could be next industry to grapple with abundance from Asian country.

item.title: Nasdaq Futures Edge Down and Bond Yields Rise

item.title: Investors should buy ‘dividend futures,’ Goldman Sachs says
item.description: Goldman Sachs said dividend rates currently priced into the market are well below the rates expected by analysts.
